subject: Cannot login to my account
body: I've been trying to reset my password for the past hour but the reset email never arrives. I've checked my spam folder. This is blocking my work, I need access urgently.

subject: Payment failed
body: My credit card was declined when trying to upgrade my subscription. The card is valid and has sufficient funds. Error code: PAYMENT_002

subject: Feature request: Dark mode
body: It would be great if the app had a dark mode option for nighttime use. Not urgent, but would improve UX.

subject: App crashes on startup
body: The mobile app crashes immediately when I try to open it. This started after the latest update. iPhone 14, iOS 17.2. Completely unable to use the app.

subject: How do I export my data?
body: I'd like to export all my data to CSV format. Can you guide me through the process or point me to documentation?

subject: Slow dashboard loading
body: The analytics dashboard takes 30+ seconds to load. It used to be instant. This is affecting my daily workflow but I can still access data through API.

subject: Security concern - data breach?
body: I received an email claiming to be from your company asking for my password. Is this legitimate? I'm worried my account may have been compromised.

subject: Invoice missing from last month
body: I was charged last month but didn't receive an invoice. I need it for accounting purposes. Account ID: ACC-12345

subject: Integration with Slack not working
body: Set up the Slack integration yesterday but notifications aren't coming through. Checked permissions, everything looks correct. No error messages.

subject: Loving the new features!
body: Just wanted to say the recent updates are fantastic. The new UI is much cleaner and the performance improvements are noticeable. Keep up the great work!
